long_description: The casual elegance, feminine fit and technical finesse of this sporty Lole Essential Jacket for women moves easily from the street to the gym, keeping you comfortable with moisture-wicking fabric. With just enough stretch to hug the body, the nylon and spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and protects against too much UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Lole Essential Jacket for women has a 26.5 in length. Full zip; stand-up collar; single zip right-hand pocket; flat seams; reflective logo.
short_description: The casual elegance, feminine fit and technical finesse of this sporty Lole Essential Jacket for women moves easily from the street to the gym, keeping you comfortable with moisture-wicking fabric.
